        public static java.util.Map<Assignment,java.lang.Double> getNBest(java.util.Map<Assignment,java.lang.Double> initTable,
                                                  int nbest)
        Returns a smaller version of the initial table that only retains the N elements with a highest value
        Parameters:
        initTable - the full initial table
        nbest - the number of elements to retain
        Returns:
        the resulting subset of the table

      • getRanking

        public static int getRanking(java.util.Map<Assignment,java.lang.Double> initTable,
             Assignment assign)
        Returns the ranking of the given assignment in the table, assuming an ordering of the table in descending order.
        Parameters:
        initTable - the table
        assign - the assignment to find
        Returns:
        the index in the ordered table, or -1 if the element is not in the table
